description: This file defines a React component called NotesList that renders a list of notes with search, sorting, and add/delete functionalities. It includes UI elements like SearchBar, NoteItem, and EmptyState, and handles user interactions for note selection, sorting, and creation.

methods.name: NotesList({ notes, selectedId, onSelect, query, onQueryChange, sort, onSortChange, onAddNote, onDeleteNote, })
